name: Save Bob
description:
Backstory

You are a sleep keeper and you keep the sleep of bob. You have to let Bob sleep for another hour. 

Controls

You have only 3 buttons, "A", "D" and "Escape". "A" and "D" in order to control player and "Escape" is to start or end game.

Credits

This game was made by :()Vocatan for Mini Jam 112.
